714116f-a.text:
117-101 .est 6lst Street, north side, adjoining and at the N.W. corner of Columbus avenue. Most of this picture is taken
up by the Twelfth Regiment rmory.
May 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

719061f-a.text:
Columbus Ave, west side, north from 61st Street,
May 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

719060f-a.text:
(I)
Columbus Avenue,West Side,and North fromm 6Ist Street,showing the Twelth Regiment Armory and Cadillac Building.
November Ist,I928
(2)
The same,showing less of the Arwory and more of the Cadillac
Building.
November Ist,I928
(3)
The same. The 'I' was demolished shortly after this was taken.
October 9th,I940

733370f-b.title: Thanksgiving ragamuffins, No.61-63.
733370f-b.text:
(1)
Thanksgiving Ragamuffins, 1933, No. 61, on the Ioof of the amall building in Central Park next to the Columbus Circle entrance. The woman on the bench is looking up at them with possibly a touch of apprehension. The scene is the same as
that of No. 60.
Novomber 30, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
No. 62. The same, another view.
November 30, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
No. 63. The same two girls, on 61st Street near Columbus
Avenue. They're boys, of course.
November 30, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
733370f-b.folder: 61st Street and Columbus Avenue, Manhattan, N.Y.
